statements: SELECT forecast_id, model_name, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE model_name = 'model1';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name, factors FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_demand > 1000 ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_demand BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT forecast_id, created_at FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY created_at ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE model_name = 'model1' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT forecast_id, model_name, forecasted_demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_demand > 100 ORDER BY forecasted_demand ASC
SELECT model_name, factors -> 'factor_1' AS factor_1_value, factors -> 'factor_2' AS factor_2_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT forecast_id, model_name, created_at FROM demand_forecast WHERE factors ->> 'category' = 'electronics'
SELECT forecast_id, model_name, factors -> 'factor_3' AS factor_3_value FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecasted_demand < 50 ORDER BY forecasted_demand DESC
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast;
SELECT product_id, date, demand FROM demand_forecast;
SELECT demand, product_id, date FROM demand_forecast;
SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM factors;
SELECT factor_value, factor_name FROM factors;
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand) AS total_demand FROM demand_forecast GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_demand > 500
SELECT factor_name, factor_value FROM factors WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_id, date, demand FROM demand_forecast WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY demand DESC
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, factor_name FROM factors ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM DemandForecastFactors;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name FROM DemandForecastFactors ORDER BY factor_name ASC;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name, factor_weight FROM DemandForecastFactors WHERE factor_weight > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecastData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM MachineLearningModels WHERE model_description LIKE '%forecast%' AND model_name = 'Linear Regression';
SELECT * FROM DemandForecastFactors WHERE factor_weight > 0.5 ORDER BY factor_name DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM MachineLearningModels WHERE model_id IN (SELECT factor_id FROM DemandForecastData GROUP BY factor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5) ORDER BY model_name;

SELECT factor_name, AVG(demand_value) AS average_demand FROM DemandForecastFactors INNER JOIN DemandForecastData ON DemandForecastFactors.factor_id = DemandForecastData.factor_id GROUP BY factor_name;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecastData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT model_name, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM MachineLearningModels INNER JOIN DemandForecastData ON MachineLearningModels.training_data_table = DemandForecastData.data_id GROUP BY model_name HAVING data_count > 100;
SELECT * FROM DemandFactors;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM DemandFactors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM DemandForecast ORDER BY Date DESC;
SELECT model_used, forecast_value FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_value > 100;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM ModelParameters ORDER BY parameter_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DemandFactors;
SELECT factor_name, factor_description FROM DemandFactors WHERE id = 1;
SELECT parameter_name FROM ModelParameters ORDER BY parameter_value DESC;
SELECT Date, actual_value FROM PredictionResults WHERE Date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT forecast_id, forecast_value, model_used FROM DemandForecast WHERE forecast_value > 100 ORDER BY forecast_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM ml_models;
SELECT model_id, model_type FROM ml_models;
SELECT features, training_data FROM ml_models WHERE model_type = 'Regression';
SELECT * FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT dataset_name, source_url FROM datasets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ml_models WHERE model_type = 'Regression';
SELECT model_id, model_type, created_at FROM ml_models ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT model_id, model_type, features FROM ml_models WHERE model_type = 'Classification' AND features IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM forecasts WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY demand_forecast DESC, confidence_level ASC;
SELECT factor_id, factor_name, factor_type FROM factors WHERE created_at > '2021-01-01' AND factor_type = 'Categorical';
